name: warehouse-production-ui
description: Manufacturing Process System - Integrated with Odoo and Authenticity API

scripts.kill-node-sync: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Get-WmiObject Win32_Process | Where-Object { $_.Name -eq 'node.exe' -and $_.CommandLine -match 'scripts\\sync_recent_mo.js|scripts\\scheduler_sync.js' } | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_.ProcessId -Force }"
